name: Brad
message: The amount of quality, free learning material on this site is incredible. It's true what they say, W6 schools really is twice as good as W3 schools.

name: Chad
message: Would rate this 10 out of 5 if I could, the content material is amazing, I've used tried learning on other websites but have gotten nowhere with them. After 10 minutes on this website, google has already offered me a senior software engineering role. I start on monday and can only thank this website for it!

name: Jeff
message: Website is good and so is the content, only thing I can critique is that I think some of these reviews might be illigitimate.

name: Bill Gates
message: I've always been interested in learning to code, but always thought it would be too hard to teach myself. That was until I found out about W6 schools. W6 schools is amazing and has taught me so much. I've only been studying for the past few days and have already coded written my own operating system thanks to this website.
